description: Re-rate tenders and optionally re-constrain rates.
permissions: User must be an admin and have TenderRater create permission for each referenced tender.
side_effects: Re-rates and/or re-constrains tenders, may update time card quantities and invoices, and triggers summary updates; may schedule an async retry on failure.
validation_notes: --tender-ids is required and must refer to existing tenders. At least one of --re-rate or --re-constrain must be true. If --update-time-card-quantities is omitted, the server defaults update_time_card_quantities to true.

flags.name: --tender-ids
flags.validation: Required; must refer to existing tenders.

flags.name: --re-rate
flags.validation: At least one of --re-rate or --re-constrain must be true.

flags.name: --re-constrain
flags.validation: At least one of --re-rate or --re-constrain must be true.

flags.name: --skip-validate-customer-tender-hourly-rates
flags.description: Skip validation of customer tender hourly rates
